name: Guardians of Atlantis
description:
Atlantis has fallen. The crystals that the city lived on dissapered. It will only be restored once you have returend them.  

Guardians Of Atlantis is a two player underwater game. In order to win the game the two players must cooperate with each other to overcome the obsticles and retrieve the crystals. The players are bound togheter with a string and have different abilityes. 


Music

Deep Breath - MondayHopes

Super Deep Grief - SamuelFrancisJohnson 


Artists

Kevin - Lead illustrator Environment artist and cover art

Sofia -  Character artist Concept and Character design and animation and        interface props and assets 

 Medina - Creative director Seaweed and Coralls, cutscene and shaders

programers
